GetProductSrockManagementKbn.Statement: SELECT stock_management_kbn FROM w2_Product WHERE shop_id = @shop_id AND product_id = @product_id

UpdateProductStock.Statement: UPDATE w2_ProductStock SET stock = stock - @stock, date_changed = getdate(), last_changed = 'batch' WHERE shop_id = @shop_id AND product_id = @product_id AND variation_id = @variation_id

GetProductInfo.Statement: SELECT product_id FROM w2_Product WHERE shop_id = @shop_id AND mall_ex_product_id = @mall_ex_product_id

GetProductId.Statement: SELECT product_id FROM w2_ProductVariationView WHERE shop_id = @shop_id AND variation_id = @variation_id

GetVariationIdFromMallExProductId.Statement: SELECT w2_ProductVariationView.variation_id FROM w2_Product INNER JOIN w2_ProductVariationView ON ( w2_Product.shop_id = w2_ProductVariationView.shop_id AND w2_Product.product_id = w2_ProductVariationView.product_id ) WHERE w2_Product.shop_id = @shop_id AND (w2_Product.mall_ex_product_id + w2_ProductVariationView.mall_variation_id1 + w2_ProductVariationView.mall_variation_id2) = @mall_ex_product_id

GetProductVariationIdFromMallExProductId.Statement: SELECT w2_ProductVariationView.product_id, w2_ProductVariationView.variation_id FROM w2_ProductVariationView LEFT JOIN ( SELECT shop_id, product_id, cooperation_id1, cooperation_id2, cooperation_id3, cooperation_id4, cooperation_id5, cooperation_id6, cooperation_id7, cooperation_id8, cooperation_id9, cooperation_id10 FROM w2_Product ) product ON ( product.shop_id = w2_ProductVariationView.shop_id AND product.product_id = w2_ProductVariationView.product_id ) LEFT JOIN w2_ProductExtend ON ( w2_ProductExtend.shop_id = w2_ProductVariationView.shop_id AND w2_ProductExtend.product_id = w2_ProductVariationView.product_id ) WHERE w2_ProductVariationView.shop_id = @shop_id AND ( @@ rakuten_sku_management_id_field_for_normal @@ = @mall_ex_product_id OR @@ rakuten_sku_management_id_field_for_variation @@ = @mall_ex_product_id )
